About
                                            PARSA Technologies
PARSA in the local Afghanistan Market is one of the trusted partners in domains of web application development, mobile application development, value-added services, HR MIS, Finance Management System, SMS Platform, and e-commerce. We are glad to demonstrate through our work that we have the capabilities, people, processes, technology, and the desire to be the strategic technology partner of choice for many Afghan entities, including government departments, the private sector, and non-governmental
organizations (NGOs).
PARSAâ€™s primary objective is to develop an environment of fairness, honesty, integrity, and courtesy towards our clients, employees, vendors, and society at large. We are committed to our customers & partners and have a passion for technology.
Job Summary
PARSA Technology is hiring an Accountant.
Duties & Responsibilities
1. Accounting and Operational Management
Record, validate, and post daily financial transactions in line with accrual accounting and approved client policies.
Maintain Customer and Walking Customer accounts, ensuring correct handling of sales, receipts, credits, and outstanding balances.
Manage Vendor accounts and contracts, including commercial invoices, bills, bill of lading records, and vendor payments.
Monitor inventory movements across warehouses, ensuring accurate linkage between purchases, sales, production, and expenses.
Track shipments and logistics documents (e.g. bills of lading) and ensure consistency with related financial postings.
2. Financial Reporting and Controls Â·
Ensure timely preparation and submission of monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports.
Monitor pending transactions, customer and vendor ageing, and outstanding balances; follow up and resolve exceptions.
Provide client management with structured financial summaries and system-generated reports to support operational and business decisions.
V. Competencies and Critical Success Factors
Functional Competencies
Knowledge Management and Learning
Shares knowledge and experience;
Actively works towards continuing personal learning and development and applies newly acquired skills.
Development and Operational Effectiveness
Strong communication skills.
Strong Pashto, Dari and English writing and speaking skills.
Experience of working with financial systems
Computer skills
Leadership and Self-Management
Focuses on result for the client and responds positively to feedback;
Consistently approaches work with energy and a positive, constructive attitude.
Demonstrates openness to change and ability to manage complexity.
Ability to establish good working relations with a range of stakeholders.
Job Requirements
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Finance, or related field.
Minimum 2â€“3 years of relevant accounting experience.
Willingness to be trained and certified on the Specific Accountant Application.
Submission Guideline
Interested individual submit their Personal CV indicating all experience from similar jobs, as well as the contact details (email and telephone number) of the Candidate to hr@parsa.technology
Note: Write the position title in the subject line
of your email.
For any further information, you can contact +93728979703

Job Summary
The Branch Manager is responsible for leading and managing all branch operations to ensure efficiency, profitability, and customer satisfaction. This role oversees staff performance, drives business growth, and maintains compliance with company policies and industry regulations. The Branch Manager serves as the primary representative of the branch, fostering strong client relationships, implementing strategic initiatives, and ensuring smooth day-to-day operations. Success in this position requires strong leadership, financial management skills, and the ability to deliver exceptional service while achieving business objectives.
Duties & Responsibilities
Leadership & Team Management
Supervise, mentor, and motivate branch staff to achieve performance targets.
Conduct regular training and performance evaluations.
Foster a positive, customer-focused work environment.
Business Development
Develop and implement strategies to increase branch sales and market share.
Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, partners, and the local community.
Identify new business opportunities and expand customer base.
Operations & Compliance
Ensure smooth day-to-day operations of the branch.
Monitor adherence to company policies, regulatory requirements, and industry standards.
Oversee cash management, security, and audit processes.
Financial Management
Prepare and manage branch budgets, forecasts, and financial reports.
Track revenue, expenses, and profitability.
Implement cost-control measures while maximizing efficiency.
Customer Service
Guarantee high-quality service delivery and customer satisfaction.
Resolve escalated customer issues promptly and effectively.
Promote customer loyalty through personalized service.
Job Requirements
Education:
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science (priority will be given to candidates holding a Masterâ€™s degree).
Languages:
Fluency in Dari, Pashto, and English.
Technical Skills:
Strong knowledge of computer science concepts and tools.
Managerial Skills:
Effective planning, decision-making, and resource management abilities.
Personal Attributes:
Leadership qualities, teamwork spirit, and strong communication skills with clients and colleagues.
Note : Applicants holding a Masterâ€™s degree will receive
extra points
during the evaluation process.
Submission Guideline
Candidates must submit an updated CV/resume along with a cover letter highlighting relevant experience and skills.
Applications should be sent via email to the designated HR address.
All applications must be received before the closing date specified in the job announcement. Late submissions will not be considered.

About
                                            Giga light ICT Solution Services
Gigalight is a leading Fixed Wireless Internet Service Provider (FWISP) operating since 2016, delivering reliable, high-speed connectivity to homes, businesses, and enterprise customers. With a strong focus on quality, stability, and coverage, Gigalight has built a solid reputation for deploying advanced wireless technologies that ensure seamless and efficient internet access even in challenging environments. Over the years, the company has continuously expanded its network footprint and enhanced its service capabilities, positioning itself as a trusted provider committed to innovation, customer satisfaction, and long-term digital development
Job Summary
Gigalight Internet Service company is seeking for young and talented individual as IT Technician for the following purpose:
The primary objective of this role is the installation and configuration of PTP/PTMP services, troubleshooting network issues, and resolving technical problems either remotely or on-site in the shortest possible time.
Note: Gigalight company is also hiring trainees, Individuals who recently graduated from computer science faculty can apply send their CV mentionoing trainee
Duties & Responsibilities
â€¢ Ability to install PTP and PTMP links.
â€¢ Install internet links and provide network consultation services to clients, assist them in troubleshooting and resolving issues.
â€¢ Install devices on telecom towers.
â€¢ Ability to install and configure network devices (Router, Switch, Rack, etc.).
â€¢ Evaluate office technical equipment for diagnosis, repair, and installation in the network.
â€¢ Record and maintain customer troubleshooting forms, and share issue-resolution timelines with the customer and the company.
â€¢ Install links and connect technical equipment according to predefined plans and schedules in due time.
â€¢ Analyze issues in links or technical devices to determine and implement the best possible solutions promptly.
â€¢ Prepare and hand over training files/instructions to customers for better usage of the network.
â€¢ Visit customer sites to inspect technical devices, diagnose problems, and resolve them as quickly as possible.
â€¢ Maintain and support all installed links.
â€¢ Inspect, audit, and review company equipment installed at customer locations to prevent future issues and provide recommendations for network improvements.
Job Requirements
â€¢ Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science
â€¢ CCNA
â€¢ MTCNA
â€¢ Familiarity with Mikrotik CCR routers
â€¢ Strong knowledge of Mikrotik, UBNT, Ubiquiti, and Mimosa devices
Submission Guideline
Applicants are requested to send their CV's in the below email address:
hr@gigalight.af

About
                                            AfghanPAY Services Company
Afghan Pay Services Company was established in 2020 with registration number 144980 and license number 70362 is registered in the Ministry of Industry and Trade. AfghanPAY started its activities in the field of electronic payment, e-up up, tickets booking and distribution channel for telecommunication companies to create a unique system and significant market presence in Afghanistan from different angles. Developed different in terms of supplying different telecommunication product lines. Moreover, AfghanPAY contracted FTTH (fiber to the home) project in partnership with Afghan Telecom Company (AFTEL) with the intention of providing high-speed internet & digital services to residential & business areas in every corner of the country to serve its beloved nation with contemporary technology and gain significant market presence in the country. 

Afghan Pay with registration number 144980 and license number 70362 is registered in the Ministry of Industry and Trade. Afghan Pay management team has more than 13 years of experience in the field of sales and distribution of telecom sectors products in the market.

Afghan Pay is committed to enter into market with a strong trading system B2B and B2C platform according to national and international norms with dedicated team, we research market goals to find and implement them.

The Afghan pay team has more than 12 years of experience in various business fields. We want to develop new business networks such as KIOSK, POS Terminals and API so that we can expand our coverage and give customers access to electronic products anytime, anywhere. To make sure that all over the country covered.

Afghan Pay intends to increase its products in every corner of the country to make your dreams come true. Click on the button on your phone to book your travel ticket and pay electronically without any risk or worry.

We know that anyone who wants to pay their electricity bill without going to a bank or Brishna company, Afghan pay invested for your satisfactions and wants to make sure all your needs are available on your phone.

Todayâ€™s technological revolution has triggered our attention to revolutionize the lifestyle of our nation through investing in the realm of technology & digitalization which is possible by launching FTTH (Fiber to the home) cutting edge technology to provide our people in every corner & counter with a high-speed bandwidth internet that trigger a high standard living style facilities though out Afghanistan.
Job Summary
The Java Spring Boot Developer is responsible for designing, developing, testing, deploying, and maintaining secure, scalable, and high-performance backend applications. The role involves building RESTful services, integrating databases and third-party systems, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver reliable software solutions aligned with business requirements.
Duties & Responsibilities
1. Backend Application Development
Design, develop, and maintain backend applications using Java and Spring Boot
Build and maintain RESTful APIs and microservices
Implement business logic, data processing, and system integrations
Ensure application performance, scalability, and security
2. API & Integration Development
Integrate applications with internal systems and external third-party APIs
Define and implement API contracts and data models
Ensure secure data exchange and proper error handling
Collaborate with frontend and other backend teams for seamless integration
3. Database Management
Design and manage databases using Relational Databases (RDBMS) such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or Oracle
Write optimized SQL queries and manage database transactions
Ensure data integrity, consistency, and performance
4. Software Quality Assurance
Write unit, integration, and functional tests
Debug and resolve application issues related to performance, security, and stability
Participate in code reviews and ensure compliance with coding standards
Follow best practices for clean, maintainable, and testable code
5. Support, Maintenance & Documentation
Provide ongoing support and maintenance for existing systems
Implement enhancements, bug fixes, and version upgrades
Prepare and maintain technical documentation and system designs
Ensure compliance with internal policies, security standards, and regulatory requirements
Job Requirements
Education
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
Equivalent professional experience may be considered in place of formal education
a)Â Â Â Â Â Experience & Technical Skills
Proven experience as a Java Developer
Strong hands-on experience with Spring Boot and Spring ecosystem
Experience developing RESTful APIs
Strong knowledge of RDBMS (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, etc.)
Familiarity with ORM frameworks such as JPA / Hibernate
Experience with Git or other version control systems
Understanding of application security and performance optimization
a)Â Â Â Â Â Preferred Skills
Experience with microservices architecture
Familiarity with Docker and containerization
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines
Experience with message brokers (e.g., RabbitMQ, Kafka)
Soft Skills
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
Good communication and teamwork abilities
Ability to manage tasks effectively and meet deadlines
Attention to detail and commitment to quality
Submission Guideline
AfghanPAY services company adapts quality circles of youngsters who have expertise & potential in the area of interest within the domain of business lines adapted by AfghanPAY. We require our potential candidates to submit their cover letter+ CVs to
hr@afghan-pay.com
. Please write your vacancy number (AFP-TOPUP2026-003 & field of expertise) in the subject line of your Email. We are thinking about our nationâ€™s future & fostering a culture of excellence & welcoming those who share our vision.
Please note: only short-listed candidates are contacted.

Job Summary
The MERN Full-Stack Developer is responsible for designing, developing, testing, deploying, and maintaining scalable web applications using the MERN stack. The role involves working across both frontend and backend systems, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver secure, high-performance, and maintainable software solutions that meet business requirements.

1. Backend Development (Node.js / Express)
Design, develop, and maintain backend services using Node.js and Express.js
Build and manage RESTful APIs and backend business logic
Ensure application security, performance, and scalability
Implement authentication, authorization, and data validation mechanisms

Work with Relational Databases (RDBMS) such as MySQL or PostgreSQL
Optimize database queries and ensure data integrity

3. Frontend Development (React.js)

Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement modern and intuitive designs
Manage application state and component architecture
Integrate frontend applications with backend APIs
4. API & Integration Development
Integrate third-party services and external APIs

Collaborate with other teams to define API contracts and standards

Debug and resolve application issues across the stack
Participate in code reviews to maintain quality and consistency
Ensure compliance with coding standards and best practices

Job Summary
The Mobile Application Developer (Flutter) will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, deploying, and maintaining cross-platform mobile applications for Android and iOS. The role requires a minimum of two (2) years of professional experience in Flutter, along with working knowledge of React Native, to deliver secure, high-quality, and scalable mobile solutions aligned with business requirements
Duties & Responsibilities
1. Mobile Application Development
Design, develop, and maintain cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter (Dart)
Support existing applications built with React Native and contribute to enhancements as required
Implement clean, scalable, and reusable code following best development practices
Collaborate with UI/UX designers to deliver intuitive and user-friendly interfaces
2. API & Integration Development
Integrate mobile applications with backend systems using RESTful APIs
Work closely with backend teams to define API contracts and data structures
Integrate third-party services, SDKs, and external APIs
Ensure secure data handling, proper error management, and data validation
3. Software Quality Assurance
Perform unit testing and support integration testing activities
Debug and resolve application issues related to performance, stability, and security
Participate in code reviews to ensure quality and consistency
Ensure applications meet functional, performance, and security standards

About
                                            Etisalat Afghanistan
- Etisalat Afghanistan is 100% owned subsidiary of Etisalat UAE. Etisalat is one of the largest telecommunications companies in the world and the leading operator in the Middle East and Africa, headquartered in the UAE.
Etisalat Afghanistan is committed to developing the Afghan national work force as an organizational priority. Itâ€™s an equal opportunities employer and will ensure development of Afghan nationals by capacity building and using training facilities.
Job Summary
Role Purpose
To provide functional support for the companyâ€™s ERP and financial systems, primarily Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations (D365 F&O), ensuring smooth day-to-day operations, accurate financial processing, and effective user support across finance-related modules.
Duties & Responsibilities
â€¢ Provide functional support for D365 Finance & Operations across General Ledger, Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Fixed Assets, Budgeting, and Procurement processes.
â€¢ Handle day-to-day ERP incidents, user queries, troubleshooting, and basic configuration support related to financial transactions.
â€¢ Support month-end and year-end closing activities, including sub-ledger to General Ledger checks, reconciliations, and exception analysis.
â€¢ Assist in maintaining system configurations such as posting profiles, financial dimensions, calendars, and basic security roles under supervision.
â€¢ Generate standard and ad-hoc financial and operational reports from ERP and support data analysis activities.
â€¢ Support User Acceptance Testing (UAT) for finance-related system changes, including test execution and post-deployment validation.
â€¢ Assist in documenting SOPs, user guides, and process flows for ERP and finance processes.
â€¢ Coordinate with IT ERP, vendors, and internal stakeholders to log tickets, track resolutions, and validate fixes.
â€¢ Provide day-to-day user training and guidance on ERP usage and controls.
â€¢ Support internal and external audit requests by extracting system data and explaining transactional flows.
â€¢ Ensure compliance with internal policies, controls, and data accuracy standards.
Job Requirements
Required Qualifications & Experience
Bachelorâ€™s degree in
accounting, Finance, Business Administration, IT
, or a related field.
4 years
of experience in ERP functional support, finance systems, or accounting systems.
Hands-on experience with
Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations
or similar ERP systems.
Good understanding of
core accounting processes
(GL, AP, AR, Fixed Assets).
Strong analytical skills and ability to troubleshoot transactional and posting issues.
Good communication skills and ability to work with cross-functional teams.
Preferred / Plus Qualifications
Experience with
other ERP systems
in addition to D365 F&O (e.g., Dynamics AX, SAP, Oracle, NetSuite, Odoo).
Exposure to or progress toward
professional accounting qualifications
(ACCA / FIA / CA / CPA).
Hands-on experience with
QuickBooks or similar accounting software
.
Experience supporting
month-end close, audits, or financial reporting
activities.
Familiarity with
reporting and data tools
(Advanced Excel, Power BI, SSRS).
Experience working in
telecom, FMCG, manufacturing, or asset-intensive environments
.
Competencies & Skills
Strong problem-solving and analytical mindset
Attention to detail and data accuracy
Ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities
Willingness to learn ERP best practices and controls
Team-oriented with a customer-service mindset

About
                                            Baheer Group (BG)
Baheer Group (BG) is a prominent manufacturer and provider of high-quality papers and paper products, offering premium solutions in Papers, Packaging, Printing, Mines & Energy, and supplying state-of-the-art Printing Machineries. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our diversified portfolio, which caters to both domestic and international markets. Backed by an extensive Group of Companies, BG consistently surpasses industry standards, specializing in customized products tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients.
Job Summary
We are seeking an experienced Full stack developer to join our team. This role is suited for a developer who has worked on production systems, understands modern development workflows, and can contribute effectively to both backend and frontend development in a professional environment.
The ideal candidate is comfortable working with established systems, writing high-quality code, and collaborating with other engineers to deliver reliable and scalable software solutions.
Duties & Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain web applications using Laravel on the backend and React (TypeScript, React Query) on the frontend
Build and maintain clean, scalable, and maintainable backend services and APIs
Develop user-facing features using modern frontend practices
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions
Review code, provide constructive feedback, and help maintain high engineering standards
Optimize application performance, database queries, and system reliability
Work with Git and GitHub in a collaborative, team-based workflow
Use Docker for development, testing, and deployment environments
Participate in system improvements, refactoring, and technical decision-making
Contribute to documentation and technical knowledge sharing
Job Requirements
Strong professional experience with Laravel (PHP) in production environments
Solid experience with React.js, TypeScript and modern JavaScript development
Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience designing and consuming RESTful APIs
Good understanding of relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, or similar)
Proficiency with Git and GitHub (branching strategies, pull requests, code reviews)
Practical experience using Docker in real projects
Ability to write clean, readable, and well-structured code
Experience working in a collaborative, professional software team
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Submission Guideline
Baheer Group is an excellent place to grow your career. Don't hesitate to apply. the vacant position.
Please note only short-listed candidates will be contacted for an interview.

vp@baheer.af

About
                                            I Engineering Group
ieng Group provides EPC and O&M infrastructure services with a focus on the telecom and power industries. The Group's subsidiaries Eki.Struct (tower) and GreenPole (power), along with its affiliated asset management company CREI complement the functions provided by ieng.
Established in 2007, the Group is a leading provider of telecom infrastructure and managed services in Africa and Emerging Markets.
We have grown rapidly since our inception in 2007 and are now operational in 19 countries: Afghanistan, Algeria, Cameroon, Central African Republic, Chad, DR Congo, Ethiopia, Ghana, Guinea, Kenya, KSA, Lebanon, Liberia, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, Philippines, South Sudan and Uganda.
Today, we maintain over 31,200+ sites for Africaâ€™s largest MNOs and all TowerCos.
Our vision
To become the leading Engineering Procurement and Construction (EPC) and Operation and Maintenance (O&M) contractor in global emerging markets.
ï»¿Our Mission
We provide EPC and O&M services to the telecom, renewable energy and construction industries in global emerging markets, seamlessly integrating our core competencies with our customersâ€™ businesses, so they benefit from competitive and comprehensive solutions.
Job Summary
ieng Afghanistan is seeking highly skilled Huawei experts for RAN to join our team. The ideal candidate must have extensive experience with Huawei networks and equipment. This role involves leading network swap, network planning, optimization, troubleshooting, and maintenance efforts to ensure the highest performance and reliability of network.
Attractive package will be offered
Duties & Responsibilities
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Provide Analysis and monitoring Network performance by Checking Key Quality Indicators (KQI's)
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Monitor and demarcating service degradation (Voice and Data) by checking performance of the network nodes
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Knowledge of performance counters of RAN and Core KPIâ€™s to make sure that all necessary counters are activated for daily, weekly, monthly and critical outages.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Using Big Data analytics to provide trend analysis for KQI/KPI and provide suggestions and solution on performance improvement
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Customer proactive support using signaling call flows and big data analytics to improve Customer experience.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Investigate and analyze individual User complaints for " CS and PS" services, international link's (link utilization, call performance)
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Mapping between KPI's & KQI's that's related to worst cell/Site/Node analysis to assist relevant team in improving network performance.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Detect value added cases by analyzing which KPI affect services.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Reviewing and making guidelines for network performance and people management.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Managing day-to-day Network KPIs and performed required analysis to improve the service delivery
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Review of various reports (Site outage report, KPI reports, Daily CR report, Pending Outage Reports).
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Checking and reviewing of the KPIs and SLA of the TTâ€™s created by Monitoring team.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Technical review of the work orders change request which are impacting the NOC monitoring.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Providing post incident report and Root cause analysis for Major and Critical Incidents and User complaints.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Expert knowledge of U2020, BSC, RNC, 2G, 3G, LTE/5G technologies and Huawei RAN solutions.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Empower local RAN team to do complex task and train them daily, weekly and monthly basis.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Proven experience in leading large-scale RAN projects and optimization initiatives.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Network deployment and implementation to oversee installation and configuration of RAN components and ensure equipment is step according design and standards.
Â·Â Â Â Â Capacity Management to assess network traffic and make sure that each interface has enough capacity to handle peak hours traffic.
Â·Â Â Â Â Trouble shooting and Problem Resolution to analyze problem, degradation and other RAN KPIs.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Use available or third partiesâ€™ or specialized software tools for network analysis and trouble shooting.
Â·Â Â Â Â Technology Upgrades and Updates, Ability to migrate from vendor to Vendor and advance wireless technology.
OH&S/QMS Role and Responsibilities:
Reports any hazards or risks in addition to Accidents/Incident to QHSE department.
Be aware of and complies to i engineeringâ€™s IMS Policy.
Abides by i engineeringâ€™s Local Legal and Client Requirements.
Attends and engages in IMS Awareness Sessions.
Ensures that all IMS procedures are regularly followed and raises the issue when they are not
Job Requirements
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Minimum 5 years of experience.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â BSc. in /Electrical/IT, Telecom Engineering/Computer Engineering
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Excellent presentation skills.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Must have strong telecom skills and knowledge of common programs such as Microsoft Office.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Ability to work under pressure.
ï»¿ï»¿ï»¿ï»¿
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data and make data-driven decisions.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Excellent communication, presentation, and client-facing abilities.
Submission Guideline
Please ensure to write the position title and vacancy number in the subject line of your email, and send your CV along with a cover letter. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

HMIS Data Assistance
MAGNA,

Apply Now

Kunduz, Afghanistan

Full Time
1166

About
                                            MAGNA
MAGNA
is a medical humanitarian organization that has been actively working worldwide and providing humanitarian aid for more than 20 years. Now our projects cover about 15 countries. The largest programs are deployed in
Congo (DR), Syria, South Sudan, Iraq, Afghanistan and Ukraine
. We implement our humanitarian aid projects by working directly with the medical institutions and supporting doctors provided direct emergency medical care to patients who need it.
MAGNA
operates internationally and provides assistance to children and their families in need, including victims of natural disasters, wars and conflicts. In the field we maintain doctors and medical staff but also technical and other specialists, providing humanitarian assistance and help to treat children and their families.
MAGNA
focusing on
Health, Nutrition and MHPSS
projects, primarily aimed at saving lives and alleviating the suffering of those in need. Armed conflicts and unstable political situations have a devastating impact on ordinary people. Consequences, often associated with inadequate local health services, commonly include direct violence, forced displacement, epidemics, famine, and psychological trauma. Providing medical assistance to victims of conflicts and crises is MAGNA workersâ€™ top priority. Alleviating suffering from infectious diseases neglected by local structures is another major area of MAGNAâ€™s focus.
MAGNA
has a zero tolerance policy with regard to Sexual Exploitation and Abuse by MAGNAâ€™s personnel against the people they serve. Protection from Sexual Exploitation and Abuse (PSEA) is the responsibility of everyone and all selected candidates will be required to comply with MAGNAâ€™s PSEA Policy at all times. Selected candidates will therefore undergo rigorous reference and background checks against their past behavior related to sexual exploitation and abuse, and may be required to provide additional information further on in the selection process.
Job Summary
Defining, coordinating and monitoring all data related activities including data collection, analysis, reporting, monitoring and evaluation processes according to
MAGNA
protocols, standards and procedures in order to ensure quality medical care for patients and their communities and to improve the health condition of the population
Duties & Responsibilities
Accountabilities:
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Data Entry and Monitoring, assist with daily data entry tasks for the health facilities (clinics, hospitals, health centers) and support the establishment of monitoring tools for data collection processes.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Data Verification, ensure that all collected data is accurate, consistent, and aligned with the project's indicators. Perform regular checks to ensure the quality and completeness of data.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Technical Assistance, provide technical support and guidance to the health care providers and data entry team on how to use HMIS tools for data entry. Help resolve issues related to data collection.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Data Analysis Support, assist in analyzing collected data to identify trends, gaps, and key performance indicators (KPIs). Support the review and assessment of data to ensure project targets are being met.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Reporting and Feedback, assist in the preparation of monthly and quarterly reports on analyzed data. Provide feedback to the health facilities on the status of their data quality and suggest areas for improvement.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Capacity Building Support, assist in identifying and addressing training needs for the health facilities' staff related to HMIS. Participate in on-the-job training sessions to improve skills in data entry, quality control, and analysis.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â HR Coordination, support the HR department in monitoring the training and development needs of the data entry staff. Assist in the organization of training or induction programs for new data team members.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Support Project Teams, attend regular internal meetings and training sessions, such as MAGNA's coordination meetings and trainings, to contribute to team updates and feedback. Participate in the dissemination of project-related information to the team.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Data Update and Communication, ensure that all HMIS data collection tools are updated regularly. Assist in sharing relevant updates with team members and healthcare providers to ensure consistent communication of expectations.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Report Preparation, support the preparation and submission of regular data reports to the Ministry of Health (MoPH), donors, and MAGNA. Ensure reports are accurate, complete, and submitted on time.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Team Collaboration, work closely with the medical team and health supervisors to ensure proper data collection and entry practices. Participate in collaborative team efforts to assess and improve data handling processes.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Additional Tasks, perform any other tasks assigned by the supervisor to support the success of the project, including assisting with other administrative or operational activities as needed
Context Specific Accountabilities:
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will assist with daily data entry tasks for the health facilities (clinics, hospitals, health centers) and support the establishment of monitoring tools for data collection processes.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will help review and adapt HMIS data collection tools to meet the projectâ€™s needs and indicators, under the guidance of the HMIS Manager.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will ensure that all HMIS data collection tools are updated regularly. Assist in sharing relevant updates with team members and healthcare providers to ensure consistent communication of expectations.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will ensure the regular supply of HMIS tools to the health facilities, and he will maintain the supply of HMIS tools on need based to the health facilities.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will assist in ensuring that all staff follow the HMIS Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for data collection and documentation.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will assist with the verification and validation of collected data to maintain consistency and quality at all health facility levels.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will ensure that all collected data is accurate, consistent, and aligned with the project's indicators. Perform regular checks to ensure the quality and completeness of data.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will help in analyzing key project indicators and comparing collected data with project targets to assess the performance of activities and identify areas for improvement.
-Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â He will ensure that all patient data and sensitive information are handled with full respect and maintained confidentially in accordance with privacy guidelines.
He will perform any other tasks assigned by the supervisor to support the success of the project, including assisting with other administrative or operational activities as needed
Job Requirements
Education
MD/ Nursing degree from recognized institute
Experience
At least 2 years of experience in HMIS and Data entry.
Submission Guideline
Interested and Qualified applicants can send their application and CV to the following email:
personal-adm-mng@af.magna.org
No other type of submission will be accepted.
Please mention the vacancy number and position name in the subject line of the email. Otherwise, you will not be shortlisted.
Regarding MAGNA recruitment process, please note that!
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â MAGNA will conduct its recruitment on the basis of need only.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â MAGNA commits to a fair and transparent recruitment procedure.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Only HR department will contact you during the recruitment process.
Â·Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â MAGNA may keep data of your application for its pool of candidate and might propose to you another position than the one you applied for based on your qualification.
Only short-listed candidates whose application responds to the criteria will be contacted & local applicants from the same province are encouraged to apply and will be given priority.

About
                                            Kabul Space Logistic & Technology Services
Welcome to KabulSpace
, a premier
software development and IT solutions
company headquartered in Kabul, Afghanistan. We specialize in creating tailored digital applications, offering end-to-end services from custom software design to system integration and consulting.
Our expertise extends to enterprise networking and mission-critical network infrastructure, ensuring reliable support and scalability for businesses. With a skilled and passionate team, we deliver innovative, efficient, and customer-focused solutions that empower organizations, whether private enterprises or non-governmental entities, to thrive in a dynamic technological landscape. Letâ€™s shape the future together!
Job Summary
As a senior Android application developer (Java
SE within Gradle) atÂ Kabulspace, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining secure and complex mobile applications.
You will work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions that meet our client's needs and enhance user experience with a focus on real-time end-to-end encrypted communication.
Duties & Responsibilities
Developing and maintaining Enterprise Android applications using Java SE.
Knowledge of real-time communication features and protocols.
Knowledge of restful web API and Microservices.
Utilize Git and GitHub for version control, code reviews, and collaborative development.
Analyze, debug, and test existing mobile applications, considering performance, processes, and productivity.
Participating in software testing processes such as unit testing, automated functional testing and integration testing to ensure app stability and performance.
Collaborate with product managers, UI/UX designers, and other developers to define project requirements and specifications.
Write clean, scalable, and efficient code following best practices and coding standards.
Conduct code reviews, provide feedback, and mentor junior developers.
Provide mentoring and training to junior developers and collaborate closely with the management team to provide status updates, challenges, and progress reports.
Work under the supervision of the sub-directorate and provide regular tasks status update, challenges and reports to the management as per the service level agreement (SLA).
Write and maintain technical documentation, API guides, and user manuals.
Perform any other duties related to the role assigned by the management.
Training and support for other team members.
Job Requirements
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Information System, or a related field.
3+ years of professional experience in mobile application development.

About
                                            Kabul Space Logistic & Technology Services
Welcome to KabulSpace
, a premier
software development and IT solutions
company headquartered in Kabul, Afghanistan. We specialize in creating tailored digital applications, offering end-to-end services from custom software design to system integration and consulting.
Our expertise extends to enterprise networking and mission-critical network infrastructure, ensuring reliable support and scalability for businesses. With a skilled and passionate team, we deliver innovative, efficient, and customer-focused solutions that empower organizations, whether private enterprises or non-governmental entities, to thrive in a dynamic technological landscape. Letâ€™s shape the future together!
Job Summary
Job Summary:
As a senior iOS application developer at the Kabulspace, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining complex iOS applications. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions that meet our clientsâ€™ needs and enhance user experience.
Duties & Responsibilities
Key Responsibilities:
iOS App Development:
Develop and maintain iOS applications using Swift and/or Objective-C.
Ensure seamless integration of UI/UX designs within the iOS ecosystem (UIKit, SwiftUI).
Real-Time Communication:
Work with real-time communication messaging protocols and libraries.
Integrate third-party libraries and services for real-time messaging.
API & Data Handling:
Understand and consume RESTful APIs; handle JSON/XML data.
Utilize encryption protocols for secure message delivery.
Code Analysis & Debugging:
Study, analyze, and understand complex software application code in Swift/Objective-C.
Debug and optimize existing iOS applications, ensuring high performance and productivity.
Database & Backend Integration:
Work with relational databases such as PostgreSQL, MariaDB, or MySQL.
Have basic familiarity with NoSQL (e.g., Firebase, MongoDB) for scalable backend solutions.
Understand distributed key-value stores (e.g., Mnesia or relevant iOS-compatible alternatives).
Version Control & Collaboration:
Utilize Git and GitHub for version control and collaboration.
Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other developers to define project requirements and specifications.
Provide feedback through code reviews and mentor junior developers.
Testing & Quality Assurance:
Participate in software testing processes (unit testing, automated functional testing, integration testing).
Ensure code quality and maintain best practices and coding standards.
Documentation & Reporting:
Write, revise, and maintain software technical documentation, operational documentation, and user guides.
Provide regular task status updates, highlight challenges, and submit reports to management as per SLA.
Additional Responsibilities:
Perform any other duties related to the role as assigned by management.
Training and support for junior developers.
Job Requirements
Required Qualifications:
Education:
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Information System, or a related field.
Experience:
5+ years of professional experience in mobile application development (iOS preferred).
Proven proficiency with iOS development in Swift and/or Objective-C.
Experience with Xcode, Cocoa Touch frameworks, and iOS development best practices.
Technical Expertise:
Knowledge of end-to-end encryption frameworks and protocols.
Experience with real-time communication protocols.
Familiarity with integrating third-party libraries for real-time messaging.
Experience with databases (PostgreSQL, MariaDB, MySQL) and distributed DBMS (Mnesia or similar).
Understanding of NoSQL databases (e.g., Firebase, MongoDB) for scalable backend integration.
Proficiency in RESTful APIs and JSON/XML data handling.
Preferred Qualifications (Pulse Points):
Containerization & DevOps:
Knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, and DevOps practices.
Encryption:
Familiarity with data encryption for secure communication and storage within iOS applications.
Submission Guideline
Applicants are required to mention the Job Title and Vacancy # in the subject line of their email. Please attach your updated CV and a cover letter and send them to
hr@kabulspace.af
, with a copy (CC) to
kabulspace2025@gmail.com
. The application deadline is 10-Aug-2025, so ensure your submission is sent before this date.
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview and a demo session. We look forward to receiving your applications
.

About
                                            Behtar LTD (Behtar Group)
Behtar is a group of companies that has been at the forefront of the telecommunications, mobile money, and e-commerce sectors for 20 years. The company was founded with the vision of connecting people and businesses, and facilitating commerce in an increasingly connected world. Through the years, Behtar has grown to become a leading provider of telecommunications, mobile money, and e-commerce services in Afghanistan, with a strong reputation for innovation and customer service. Started as a small telecom service provider and quickly recognized the potential for growth and expansion in the financial services sector. we worked hard to provide innovative and cutting-edge solutions that could improve the lives of our customers. We were the first to offer high-speed internet and mobile banking services in our country, and as a result, we rapidly grew our customer base. With the passage of time, we continued to adapt and evolve to meet the changing needs of our customers, always looking for ways to push the boundaries of what was possible.
Today, the Behtar group of companies is a well-established and respected player in both the telecom and financial services sectors, known for our commitment to excellence and our ability to deliver results. We are excited to continue growing and serving our customers for many years to come.
Job Summary
The Digital Marketing Executive â€“ IT & Technology is responsible for planning, executing, and optimizing digital marketing initiatives to promote IT products, services, platforms, and technology solutions. The role requires hands-on expertise in digital advertising, performance marketing, content distribution, SEO, and analytics to enhance brand visibility, drive lead generation, and support customer acquisition objectives.
Duties & Responsibilities
1.	Digital Campaign Management
â€¢	Plan, execute, and manage integrated digital marketing campaigns for IT products, services, and platforms.
â€¢	Promote websites, applications, digital platforms, and technology solutions across multiple digital channels.
â€¢	Continuously optimize campaigns to maximize traffic, engagement, and conversion performance.
2.	Performance Marketing & Analytics
â€¢	Manage paid advertising campaigns across Google Ads, social media platforms, and other digital channels.
â€¢	Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs), including traffic, click-through rates (CTR), conversion rates, and return on investment (ROI).
â€¢	Prepare regular performance reports and provide data-driven optimization recommendations.
3.	Content & Social Media Marketing
â€¢	Coordinate the creation, scheduling, and distribution of digital content, including social media posts, banners, videos, blogs, and promotional materials.
â€¢	Manage and grow the organizationâ€™s presence across relevant social media platforms.
â€¢	Communicate IT use cases, features, and benefits through effective digital storytelling and campaigns.
4.	SEO & Website Promotion
â€¢	Support search engine optimization (SEO) activities, including keyword research, on-page optimization, and content alignment.
â€¢	Improve website visibility, organic traffic, and search engine rankings.
â€¢	Coordinate with technical and content teams to ensure SEO best practices are implemented.
5.	Email Marketing & Lead Generation
â€¢	Plan and execute email marketing campaigns and lead nurturing workflows.
â€¢	Generate, track, and qualify leads for IT products and technology services.
â€¢	Maintain lead databases, campaign tracking, and performance dashboards.
6.	Coordination & Communication
â€¢	Coordinate closely with IT, product development, design, and sales teams.
â€¢	Align digital marketing strategies with business objectives and product roadmaps.
â€¢	Support product launches, feature releases, and promotional campaigns.
Job Requirements
â€¢	Bachelorâ€™s degree in Marketing, Information Technology, Business Administration, or a related field.
â€¢	Proven experience in digital marketing, preferably within IT, technology, or digital platforms.
â€¢	Hands-on experience with Google Ads, social media advertising platforms, and analytics tools.
â€¢	Strong understanding of SEO, SEM, digital marketing funnels, and conversion optimization.
â€¢	Excellent analytical, reporting, and communication skills.
Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
â€¢	Growth in website traffic and user engagement.
â€¢	Lead generation volume and conversion rates.
â€¢	Campaign ROI and cost-efficiency.
â€¢	Brand visibility, reach, and online presence growth.
Submission Guideline
Interested national candidates are kindly requested to submit their application (Cover letter & updated CV) no later than 31 Jan 2026 to the below email:
kbl.hr@behtar.com.af
Note that the applicant must be based in Kabul.

About
                                            Quick Prime
Quick Prime Logistics is a trusted service provider in Afghanistan, delivering reliable logistics solutions for businesses and individuals. Alongside our core logistics services, we offer complete technology solutionsâ€”including web development, mobile app development, and custom softwareâ€”to help organizations modernize operations, improve efficiency, and grow with confidence. From planning and design to development, deployment, and support, Quick Prime combines practical industry experience with modern technology to deliver secure, scalable, and user-friendly systems.
Job Summary
Quick Prime Logistics is hiring
Intern Developers
to join our team in
Afghanistan
. This internship is designed for students, recent graduates, and self-learners who want practical, real-project experience with guidance from experienced developers.
No previous professional experience is required.
If you have foundational knowledge and a strong willingness to learn, you are encouraged to apply.
As an Intern Developer, you will contribute to real software products and internal tools. You may work in one or more areas such as web development, mobile development, or general software engineering, depending on your interests and team needs.
Duties & Responsibilities
Contribute to building and improving software features under mentorship
Write clean, readable, and maintainable code
Assist with debugging, testing, and performance improvements
Participate in code reviews and learn development best practices
Work with the team to understand requirements and deliver tasks on time
Maintain documentation for features, fixes, and technical notes
Collaborate with designers, developers, and product stakeholders
Job Requirements
Skills and Qualifications (Preferred)
Programming & Computer Science
Understanding of programming concepts such as OOP, data structures, and algorithms
Strong problem-solving and logical thinking
Familiarity with software development lifecycle and coding standards
Web Development (if applying for web/full-stack track)
HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Familiarity with modern front-end development practices (component-based UI, responsive design)
Experience or exposure to frameworks such as React
Understanding of back-end development concepts (APIs, authentication, server-side logic)
Exposure to Node.js, Django, Laravel, or similar frameworks
Mobile Development (if applying for mobile track)
Understanding of mobile app development workflows
Exposure to Flutter, React Native, or native Android/iOS development
Familiarity with app navigation, UI layouts, and integrating APIs
Databases & Data Handling
Understanding of relational databases and querying
Experience or exposure to SQL, MySQL, or PostgreSQL
Familiarity with data modeling concepts and validation
Tools & Professional Practices
Version control using Git and GitHub
Familiarity with issue tracking and task management tools (Jira, Trello, GitHub Issues, etc.)
Ability to read documentation and learn new technologies independently
Clear communication, teamwork, and time management
Quality & Delivery
Understanding of testing concepts (unit testing, integration testing)
Attention to detail and ability to follow requirements
Interest in writing secure, reliable, and scalable code
Note
If you donâ€™t meet every preferred skill listed above, we still encourage you to apply. We value motivation, learning ability, and a strong work ethic.
What You Will Gain

VastGlobe Logistics is a procurement-driven logistics company that specializes in finding, sourcing, and delivering a wide range of equipment, technology, and facility solutions large organizational customers worldwide. We work with trusted manufacturers and distributors, manage complex requirements, and coordinate delivery from suppliers to final destinations with a strong focus on documentation, quality, and on-time performance.
Job Summary
We are looking for a
highly disciplined, detail-obsessed International Sourcing & Quotation Specialist
to work
night shifts (not a 9â€“5 job)
.
Your main job:
Find opportunities
Find the right items online
Call and email vendors to get pricing and terms
Prepare and submit professional quotations
You will be talking to different vendors every day, so you must be
fluent in English
(not â€œmedium Englishâ€), a
strong critical thinker
, and have a
solid IT background
.

Market & Opportunity Research

email and phone
during your shift to:
Request quotes
Clarify specifications
Confirm stock, lead time, and shipping options.
Follow up consistently until you receive complete quotations.

Compare prices, lead times, and technical compliance.
Build clean, professional quotations using company templates.
Double-check all numbers, SKUs, quantities, and terms before submission.
Coordination & Documentation
Keep accurate records of all vendor communications and quotes.
Update internal trackers and CRM tools with status, prices, and follow-ups.
Work closely with management to finalize margins and submission prices.
Make sure deadlines are never missed and everything is submitted on time.

punctual
: login on time, attend calls on time, and meet every deadline.

responsive
: reply quickly on email, WhatsApp, or internal tools during your shift.

night hours
(not a typical 9â€“5), aligned with client/vendor time zones.

Very careful with numbers, quantities, SKUs, and dates.
Double-checks work before sending anything out.

Highly dedicated, reliable, and consistent.
Can work independently without constant supervision.

Clear and polite communication style (no slang, no unprofessional language).

Government / B2B tenders and RFQs

Online tender portals

Practical experience in providing technical and business Customer Support and Services is required.
Practical experience and working knowledge of various computer platforms and applications are required.
Language Requirements:
Fluency in English is required. Knowledge of another official UN language (Arabic, Chinese, French, Russian or Spanish) or a local language is an asset.
Desirables:
Relevant experience at country level, particularly in development, fragile settings and humanitarian contexts.
Submission Guideline
Remarks:
As per Article 101, paragraph 3, of the Charter of the United Nations, the paramount consideration in the employment of the staff is the necessity of securing the highest standards of efficiency, competence, and integrity.
UNICEF is committed to fostering an inclusive, representative, and welcoming workforce. For this position, eligible and suitable
Female
candidates
are encouraged to apply.
Vacancy announcement is open to internal and external candidates. Priority will be given to staff in abolished posts and internal staff members.
Government employees who are considered for employment with UNICEF are normally requiredÂ to resign from their government positions before taking up an assignment with UNICEF. UNICEF reserves the right to withdraw an offer of appointment, without compensation, if a visa or medical clearance is not obtained, or necessary inoculation requirements are not met, within a reasonable period for any reason.
UNICEF does not charge a processing fee at any stage of its recruitment, selection, and hiring processes (i.e., application stage, interview stage, validation stage, or appointment and training). UNICEF will not ask for applicantsâ€™ bank account information.
Humanitarian action is a cross-cutting priority within UNICEFâ€™s Strategic Plan. UNICEF is committed to stay and deliver in humanitarian contexts. Therefore, all staff, at all levels across all functional areas, can be called upon to be deployed to support humanitarian response, contributing to both strengthening resilience of communities and capacity of national authorities.
All UNICEF positions are advertised, and only shortlisted candidates will be contacted and advance to the next stage of the selection process. An internal candidate performing at the level of the post in the relevant functional area, or an internal/external candidate in the corresponding Talent Group, may be selected, if suitable for the post, without assessment of other candidates.
Candidates who have applied previously do not need to reapply.
Additional information about working for UNICEF can be found
here
.

Applications received via JOBS.AF online portal will not be given consideration.

About Us
COMSIS Solutions is a U.S.-based company located in Alexandria, Virginia. Since 2014, we have been providing advanced technology, cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, and logistics solutions. We work with U.S. Government agencies and deliver all our projects in full compliance with FAR/DFARS regulations. Our focus is on quality, compliance, on-time delivery, and transparency. COMSIS offers a professional and collaborative work environment with strong opportunities for growth and learning.
Job Summary
We are seeking a highly motivated and independent Procurement & Operations Specialist to manage th e end-to-end procurement process for cur company. This role involves sourcing, negotiating, purchasing. vendor management, and resolving issues as they arise. You will work remotely and independently, often on-demand, to support different contracts and global supply chain need.
Duties & Responsibilities
Handle the complete procurement lifecycle from sourcing to purchasing.
Negotiate pricing, terms, and lead times with vendors and supplier.

Prepare and manage invoices, documentation, and compliance paperwork.

Ensure timely procurement based on project deadlines.
Perform multitasking and versatile duties to support operations as needed.
Communicate directly with the management team regarding procurement status.
Maintain organized records of purchases, contracts, and supplier communications.
Job Requirements

Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
Ability to negotiate effectively and close deals.
Must be highly independent, proactive, and able to work without supervision.
Flexible availability (not fixed to standard 9-5 hours).
Reliable laptop/computer and stable high-speed internet connection.
Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
Fast learner with a problem-solving mindset.
Comfortable with remote work and taking full responsibility for tasks.
Fluent in English.
Knowledge and skills in IT to work with digital systems and toolsz

About
                                            Hushmand Shahar Information Technology Service Company
Hushmand Shahar Information Technology Service Company is a trusted provider of
IT solutions, software development, and digital transformation services
in Afghanistan. Our mission is to empower businesses with innovative technology solutions that enhance efficiency, security, and scalability.
With a team of experienced professionals, we specialize in
custom software development, enterprise solutions, cloud computing, and IT infrastructure services
. We are committed to delivering cutting-edge solutions that help organizations stay competitive in the digital world.
Our Services
Software Development:
Custom web and mobile applications using Laravel, React, Next.js, and more.
Enterprise IT Solutions:
ERP, MIS, CRM, and custom business software.
IT Consultancy:
Digital strategy, system integration, and cybersecurity.
Cloud Solutions:
AWS, DigitalOcean, Laravel Forge, and cloud-based deployments.
E-Commerce Development:
Scalable online store solutions with secure payment gateways.
Why Choose Us?
Expert Team:

Quality & Security:
Industry-standard practices ensuring high-performance and secure applications.
Client-Focused Approach:
Tailored solutions that align with business needs.
Reliable Support:
Ongoing maintenance and technical support for seamless operations.
Our Vision
To be a leading technology service provider in Afghanistan, driving digital innovation and business growth.
Our Mission
To develop reliable, scalable, and high-performance technology solutions that help businesses streamline their operations and achieve success.
Job Summary
We are seeking a
highly skilled Laravel Developer
to join our dynamic team at
Hushmand Shahar Information Technology Service Company
. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in
Laravel, PHP, and modern web development technologies
and will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining robust, scalable, and high-performance web applications.
This role requires a deep understanding of
MVC architecture, database management, and front-end technologies
. As a Laravel Developer, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to
build secure applications, integrate APIs, optimize performance
, and troubleshoot technical challenges.
Duties & Responsibilities
Develop, maintain, and enhance web applications using
Laravel and PHP
.
Design and implement efficient
database architectures
using MySQL, PostgreSQL, or other relational databases.
Write clean, well-documented, and scalable
RESTful APIs
and integrate third-party services.
Optimize application
performance, security, and scalability
.
Implement authentication and authorization mechanisms such as
JWT, OAuth, or Laravel Sanctum
.
Work with front-end developers to integrate
Vue.js, React, or Alpine.js
into Laravel applications.
Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve software defects and application errors.
Utilize
Git version control
and follow best practices in software development workflows.
Implement
automated testing (PHPUnit, Pest) and CI/CD pipelines
for seamless deployment.
Maintain clear
technical documentation
and follow agile development methodologies.

Proven experience (2+ years) as a Laravel Developer
or in a similar role.
Proficiency in
PHP, Laravel, MySQL, and object-oriented programming (OOP)
.
Strong knowledge of
MVC architecture
and best coding practices.
Experience in
front-end technologies
(HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Vue.js, React, or Alpine.js).
Familiarity with
Laravel Blade templating
and Livewire (preferred but not mandatory).
Hands-on experience with
RESTful API development and third-party API integration
.
Understanding of
security best practices
, including data encryption and secure authentication.
Experience with
queues, cron jobs, and background task processing in Laravel
.
Knowledge of
Git, GitHub, Bitbucket, or GitLab for version control
.
Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills.
Familiarity with
Agile development methodologies (Scrum, Kanban)
.
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently or within a team.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with
FilamentPHP, Inertia.js, or Laravel Nova
.
Familiarity with
Docker, Kubernetes, or cloud deployment (AWS, DigitalOcean, Laravel Forge)
.
Hands-on experience with
NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Firebase, etc.)
.
